definition: person who makes a gift of property
details:
noun
- person who makes a gift of property
= synonyms: conferrer
- an advocate who presents a person, as for an award or a degree or an introduction
= example: an advocate who presents a person, as for an award or a degree or an introduction
= synonyms: sponsor
- someone who presents a message of some sort (as a petition or an address or a check or a memorial etc.)
